Html:
I've seen this on the Known Issues list for the last while "Various proc/use effects aren't valued/modeled correctly in some models. We created a new (much better) system for handling these special effects, at the last minute, and haven't had time to finish implementing it in all the models. So we're currently in an odd transition state where it doesn't quite work in some models. We're working on it, and will have them working soon. " 

are there any models that have this working properly?  or directions on what you did to get it working for a model?  I'd like to see this fixed this for the elemental model ( if it's not already )  and would like to see what changed.

 

Basically I'm asking which Model is most ideal as a template or reference implementation.
Cat, Bear, and Retadin are the ideal references for this.
